title: Ceiling fans, Garage parking, Key fob entry, Separate dining area
posting_body: ['Welcome Home', "Find the perfect blend of beauty and balance, form and function, work and play at the Cielo, DTC's newest urban apartments in the heart of southeast Denver.", 'With our central location, you are just minutes from fine dining, shopping, recreation, and within walking distance to the Belleview light rail station.', 'This luxurious community features a high-tech fitness center with TVs, clubroom with kitchen, Wi-fi cafe with java bar, plasma TV and DVD player.', 'An opulent swimming pool with spa with Wi-fi service and an outdoor fireplace lounge with BBQ grills for your leisure.', 'Interior finishes include exotic granite countertops, full size washers and dryers with electric fireplaces in select floor plans.', 'Each home includes a natural, light maple hard-wood style flooring in kitchens and entries, with custom-designed espresso finish cabinetry, clean and black steel energy efficient appliances, electric ranges, built-in microwaves and dishwashers, nine foot ceilings with crown molding and modern track lighting, earth- toned accent walls and oversized walk-in closets.', 'Center yourself at Cielo.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1030 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Private patio', '- Custom cabinetry', '- 9 ft ceilings', '- Private balcony', '- Pantry', '- Separate dining area', '- City and mountain/greenspace views', '- In-unit washer and dryer', '- Breakfast bar', '- Granite countertops', '- Key fob entry', '- Electric fireplace', '- Open layout', '- Dishwasher', '- Vinyl plank flooring', '- Soaking tub', '- Walk in closets', '- Ice maker', '- Microwave', '- Garbage disposal', '- Linen closets', '- Central air conditioning', '- Large closets', '- Ceiling fans', '- Stainless appliances', '- Central heat', '- Energy Star appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Near public transportation, shopping and entertainment', '- Business center', '- 24 hour fitness center', '- Hot Tub', '- Close to I-25, Bellview and I-225', '- Reserved Parking', '- Cardio Equipment', '- Complimentary Wi-Fi', '- Garage parking', '- Clubhouse', '- Cyber Café', '- Accepts dogs', '- Towel service', '- Conference room', '- Accepts cats', '- BBQ area', '- Outdoor Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Cielo welcomes your pet!', 'We are a pet friendly community offering plenty of space for your pet to run and play.', 'Our apartments accommodate up to two pets per home.', 'Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.', 'Your pets will love it here!', 'Driving Directions', 'From I-25: Exit Belleview Ave. and head west.', "Turn right onto Monaco and right onto Union Ave; we're just ahead on the left.", 'From light rail: Exit and head southeast: Cielo is straight ahead.', 'Call for hours and availability.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Cielo', '6715 E. Union Ave, Denver, CO, 80237', '5hpD681fVTNg']
